name: Gironda’s 8×8 — High-Volume (9 min per exercise)
time_per_session_breakdown: 8 sets x 30-45s + 7 x 30s rest => ~8-9 min total
overview_and_execution: Perform 8 sets of 8 reps at 60-70% 1RM, resting 30s or less between sets. Start with a lighter load under your true 8RM. Focus on completing all sets without reaching failure. Gradually reduce rest and then increase load as you adapt.
example_application: For bench press: use 135 lbs (around 60% 1RM) for 8x8 with 30s rest. Once you can complete all sets consistently, add 5-10 lbs next session.
important_notes: Avoid failure. Limit the number of heavy compound movements in a single session. Start below your 8RM to maintain quality under short rest intervals.
volume_metrics: 8 sets x 8 reps = 64 total reps per exercise
